title: Loss for remake when I wasn't afk?
body: I was playing Teemo mid and waiting invisible for the enemy laner to show up. He never showed up while I was level 3. All players were there on my team but a remake vote showed up. I voted yes to remake because my friends didn't want me to play teemo. Once we got into after game screen, it got counted as a loss for me and I have no idea why.

replies.body: This is likely due to you not attacking or taking any damage for the 3 minutes. Ensure to attack or take some minion damage to avoid being flagged as afk.

The /Remake system will flag any players if they are inactive for 90 seconds before the 3:00-minute mark. Even if you're pretty sure someone is not going to show up in lane, it's a good idea to play the game as normal, in the event they do show up. You can find more about this system in our [/Remake FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.

> Even if you're pretty sure someone is not going to show up in lane, it's a good idea to play the game as normal, in the even they do show up.

That's exactly the opposite OP is describing. He thought the opponent **was** going to show up and so remained camouflaged for his ambush, instead of CS'ing, etc. I feel for him, because this is definitely not a deserved loss.
You stood still for a minute and a half?
